channel.title: BLU-PK 317 (PI) source and client
channel.description:
Hello everyone today I decide to release my prject not done yet its has some work left lol but here what it has -Correct gs stances -working dual arena -almost perfect gs specials -some shops need to be added to it -edgeville home -kbd works -jad works -chaos elemental works -even the owners and staff have to train unless you wan't to add the ::master or ::setlevel 0 99 command then go for it -custom chat area -I'm not sure how many people can be on at the same time -I added a anti-leech to it
:Things to be added -Dragon claws -dragon platebody -shops with all the items -Sara sword -dclaws spec -and a ton more
[size=36pt]MEDIA[/size]

[quote=“imback4more, post:12, topic:539706”][quote author=RUNE-PK link=topic=658548.msg4404961#msg4404961 date=1391643818]

switch (wearID) { case 14005: targetSlot = 7; break; } switch (wearID) { case 14006: targetSlot = 9; break; } switch (wearID) { case 14007: targetSlot = 10; break; } switch (wearID) { case 15092: targetSlot = 3; break; } switch (wearID) { case 15192: targetSlot = 1; break;

I will just leave this here.

Whats that?
[/quote]

lol… its codes to insert the right item to the right slot.
Makes the platebody go to the torso slot, weapons in the weapon slot, etc…[/quote]

Oh hmm lol

item.title: BLU-PK 317 (PI) source and client

item.description:
@RUNE-PK wrote:

Hello everyone today I decide to release my prject not done yet its has some work left lol
but here what it has
-Correct gs stances
-working dual arena
-almost perfect gs specials
-some shops need to be added to it
-edgeville home
-kbd works
-jad works
-chaos elemental works
-even the owners and staff have to train
unless you wan’t to add the ::master or ::setlevel 0 99 command then go for it
-custom chat area
-I’m not sure how many people can be on at the same time
-I added a anti-leech to it

:Things to be added
-Dragon claws
-dragon platebody
-shops with all the items
-Sara sword
-dclaws spec
-and a ton more
